metadata.description: Spells that extinguish fire, remove heat, and destroy flame-based phenomena

spells.name: Smother the Hearth Fire
spells.description: This spell instantly extinguishes a single fire source, such as a campfire, torch, or candle. The flame simply vanishes without smoke or ember, leaving behind cold ash or unburned material. No heat remains.

spells.name: Chill of the Winter's Grasp
spells.description: This spell removes all heat from a person or object, making them intensely cold to the touch. The target becomes uncomfortably cold and may suffer from hypothermia if the effect is prolonged. Metal objects become painful to handle.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (remove heat from object), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter

spells.name: Quench the Raging Inferno
spells.description: This powerful spell can extinguish even large fires, including burning buildings or forest fires. All flames within the target area are instantly snuffed out, though the underlying fuel may still be hot enough to reignite if exposed to flame again.

spells.name: Destroy the Magical Flame
spells.description: This spell specifically targets and destroys magically created fire and heat effects. It can dispel fire-based spells, extinguish magical flames, and neutralize supernatural heat sources. The spell is particularly effective against conjured flames.

spells.name: Freeze the Mortal Frame
spells.description: This deadly spell removes all heat from a living being's body, causing severe hypothermia and frostbite. The victim takes a Heavy Wound as their blood begins to freeze and their body temperature drops to dangerous levels.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (remove vital heat), +2 Voice, +1 Corpus requisite

spells.name: Shatter the Molten Steel
spells.description: This spell instantly removes all heat from molten metal, causing it to cool and solidify rapidly. The sudden temperature change often causes the metal to crack or shatter. This can ruin smithing work or create dangerous flying fragments.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (remove intense heat), +2 Voice, +1 Terram requisite

spells.name: Banish the Fire Elemental
spells.description: This spell destroys fire elementals and similar flame-based supernatural creatures by extinguishing their essential fire. The creature's flames are snuffed out, causing it to dissipate back to its realm. The spell only affects beings made primarily of fire.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (destroy supernatural fire being), +2 Voice, +1 Vim requisite

spells.name: Absolute Zero of the Void
spells.description: This extremely powerful spell removes virtually all heat from an object or area, creating temperatures approaching absolute zero. The intense cold can shatter most materials and instantly kills any living thing exposed to it. Even magical protections may fail against such extreme cold.

spells.name: Snuff the Alchemist's Flame
spells.description: This spell extinguishes all fires within a large area simultaneously, including multiple torches, braziers, and small fires. It's particularly useful for disrupting alchemical laboratories or preventing the spread of fire in buildings.

spells.name: Curse of the Cold Forge
spells.description: This curse prevents any fire from being lit or maintained in the target area for an entire month. Flames are instantly extinguished upon entering the cursed space, making cooking, heating, or metalworking impossible within the affected area.
